author: makortel
body:
* Propagate the exit code of the traced program
* Option to add additional functions to trace

Following the discussion in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/46002#issuecomment-3057638171 onwards

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1452
Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1453
title: Enhance cmsTraceFunction
